title: Bosnia and Herzegovina convertible mark
summary: The Bosnia and Herzegovina convertible mark (Bosnian/Croatian/Serbian: Konvertibilna marka, Bosnian/Serbian: Конвертибилна марка; sign: KM; code: BAM) is the currency of Bosnia and Herzegovina. It is divided into 100 Pfenigs or Fenings (Bosnian/Croatian/Serbian: Pfenig/Fening; Bosnian/Serbian: Пфениг/Фенинг) and locally abbreviated KM.[1]
